main_definition: FAQs refer to a collection of frequently asked questions, often used in the context of websites or resources where common queries are addressed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Frequently Asked Questions section on a website
meanings_and_examples.example: The FAQs page provides answers to common queries about our product, such as its features and pricing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Questions that are frequently asked but not necessarily specific or unique
meanings_and_examples.example: In an online forum, users often ask the same general questions like 'How do I update my password?'

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of standardized responses to common inquiries
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's customer service team prepares a list of FAQs to help representatives provide quick and accurate answers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Questions that arise frequently due to the complexity or nature of a topic
meanings_and_examples.example: For a university course, students often have similar questions about assignment guidelines, grading policies, etc.
